main.name: hackTLV
main.bio: We are all about creating cool things and having fun. This won't be fancy, intimidating and unapproachable event like you can see in the market. hackTLV is all about community and hacking together for the sake of it. The number of participants will be around 70 people MAX! So expect for a cosy and inviting environment.

our_story.text: hackTLV was created so curious minds could have a place to hang, socialize and build amazing things. Our main focus is on consumers and monetizable products because we know each and everyone in our community has an entrepreneur inside them. We are here to unlock it - in a supportive and tribal environment. hackTLV is a closed community, we are accepting new applications all the time, so please feel free so signup to our next event, and join our awesome tribe!
